scripts.build:auth-logger: mkdir -p android/build && bunx frida-compile -o android/build/auth_flow_logger.js android/loggers/auth_flow_logger.ts
scripts.auth-logger: bun run build:auth-logger && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/auth_flow_logger.js
scripts.auth-logger:log: bun run build:auth-logger && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/auth_flow_logger.js 2>&1 | tee logs/sessions/auth_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log
